src:
苏索替补登场任意球救主 米兰1-0斯帕尔新帅迎首胜

02 Nov 2019, 03:03

【网易体育1日讯】新赛季意甲联赛第10轮比赛，米兰主场1-0击败斯帕尔，替补登场的苏索任意球破门，打进全场唯一进球。这场胜利是皮奥利上任后拿下的第一场比赛胜利。在意甲积分榜中，米兰10场比赛拿到了13个积分，暂时排名意甲第10位。斯帕尔10轮7分，排名倒数第二。出场名单： AC米兰（4-3-3）：99-多纳鲁马/43-杜阿尔特、22-穆萨基奥（46’2-卡拉布里亚）、13-罗马尼奥利、19-特奥-埃尔南德斯/79-凯西、4-本纳塞尔、39-帕奎塔（87’5-博纳文图拉）/7-卡斯蒂列霍（57’8-苏索）、9-皮亚特克、10-恰尔汗奥卢。斯帕尔（3-5-2）：99-贝里沙/40-托莫维奇、23-维卡里、4-乔内克/ 21-斯特雷费扎（82’43-帕洛斯基）、11-穆尔吉亚、7-米西罗利（71’8-瓦洛蒂）、19-库尔蒂奇、13-雷卡（82’66-萨拉蒙）/10-弗洛卡里、37-佩塔尼亚。
text:
Susso came off the free kick Savior Milan 1-0 Spar coach first victory

02 Nov 2019, 03:03

[Netease Sports 1st News] In the 10th round of the Serie A season, Milan beat Spar 1-0 at home, and Susso, who came off the bench, scored a free kick and scored the only goal in the game. This victory was the first game victory won by Pioli after taking office. In the Serie A standings, Milan scored 13 points in 10 games and temporarily ranked 10th in Serie A. Spall scored 7 points in 10 rounds, ranking second to last. Appearance list: AC Milan (4-3-3): 99-Donarumma/43-Duarte, 22-Moussakio (46'2-Calabria), 13-Romanioli, 19-Special Hernandez/79-Casey, 4-Benasel, 39-Paquita (87'5-Bonaventura)/7-Castelljo (57' 8- Suso), 9-Piatke, 10-Calhan Oulu. Spall (3-5-2): 99-Berisha/40-Tomovic, 23-Vicari, 4-Jonek/21-Strefza (82'43-Palowski ), 11-Murgia, 7-Misilo (71'8-Vallotti), 19-Kurtic, 13-Reka (82'66-Salamon)/10-Flo Cary, 37-Petrania.
